content: The Shelter Solutions segment, fourth quarter net sales of $488 million was approximately 7% lower than the same period last year and comprised of unfavorable 7.9% organic volume, slightly lower pricing actions with lower steel costs that were partially offset by favorable 1.7% impact from the UCC acquisition. The Surface Solutions segment fourth quarter net sales of $304 million were approximately 7% lower than prior year, primarily driven by favorable price and mix of 8.3%, which more than offset the lower volumes of 15.4%. Adjusted EBITDA of $25 million was down versus prior year due to the softening volume impact of $15 million as well as price and mix, not fully offsetting inflation of an unfavorable $14 million.
